title: Firefox se cae a cada rato
content: Hola, cuando uso firefox se me cierran las páginas a cada rato, las páginas se pueden quedar en blanco o se cierran inesperadamente. Esta situación ocurre en modo normal como en modo seguro. También se desconfiguran las páginas y aparecen textos con mensajes erróneos. Adjunto imagen. Además, las id de los errores comienzan con bp... por ejemplo: bp-6b5f59e2-3a9a-40dd-9695-1138e0220301
creator: k.apt

title: Mozilla doesn't recognize certificate issuer
content:
A site that I use several times every year recently wouldn't open. Response from Firefox is "Access Denied - Certificate issuer not recognized". Also kept getting bumped out of my email account and all my open tabs would close abruptly. The last may have been rectified but I still can't get into the website I want to access.

I've tried different browsers as well so I don't know if it's Mozilla only or my PC. Even if I type in https://www.(pagename).com, it displays as you don't have permission to access http://www.(pagename).com.

I changed nothing on my PC that would cause the problem.
creator: Bcamp

title: Email content on Google are blank since Firefox UPDATES installed 18Feb2022 for firefox 97.0.1
content:
7:44 pm 1 Mar 2022

How to remove updates firefox 97.0.1 but don't know if this will fix as problem only exists on my GMAIL EMAIL ACCOUNTS. SEE SCREENSHOT. email inbox content not visible they are blank

All my emails are blank. They have s header and who they are from but no text just a blank screen. This is the same for sent and recieved messaged. Really do not know how to fix this

Having the same issue, All emails received on all the email accounts I have on this device (including work email), are blank.. In addition, mails from every other day are also blank.

Only shows sender information, subject, attachment.

If I try to RESPOND or REPLY to email, I can click the three dots below reply and finally see content. Otherwise screen is blank, except for header and subject!!!!

It may have happened upon UPDATES installed 18Feb2022 for firefox 97.0.1 and I woud like to remove but don't see how to anywhere.
creator: mbensimon5773

title: Email Draft Issues
content:
I mainly use Firefox as my browser and use Microsoft Outlook for my university email. I already contacted university tech support and Microsoft Outlook tech support and neither was able to provide me with a solution except for suggesting it could be a browser issue.

When I draft an email, as I am typing the email will delete itself, archive itself, or try to set up some weird category system that I didn't initiate. It has become impossible to draft emails online for this reason because I never know when something might erase or delete as I type. I do not have any issues typing on other websites, including using Gmail.

Has anyone else had this issue before with Outlook?
creator: a314acosta
